Adaptive Management Checks Performed

  {{ report.measurement_period }}
Check for, and correct, causes of excess sediment build-up at the field-buffer interface that re-directs flow
Perform maintenance to remove concentrated flow paths through the buffer
Check for, correct causes, and path bare and/or eroded areas in the buffer
Check tree shelters and stakes, especially after flooding and high wind events
Apply herbicide around shelters in spring and fall to reduce competing vegetation
Control noxious and invasive weeds
Replant, as needed, after addressing cause of failure
